mdRecord.dcterms:title: In Memory of Louis A. "Tootie" Ballard
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Plaque in Memory of Louis A. "Tootie" Ballard, which reads as follows: "In Memory of Louis A. 'Tootie' Ballard, who served with the Salem Fire Department as a Fireman, Feb, 1, 1909, June 30, 1932, as Chief, July 1, 1932, June 30,1960, 1889-1966"
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
